title: Borehole
description: A <font color="#4f81bd">Borehole</font> is the generalized term for any narrow shaft drilled in the ground, either vertically, horizontally, or inclined.

referenceLocation.title: referenceLocation
referenceLocation.description: The property referenceLocation is an association between a Borehole and an OriginPosition corresponding to the start point of a borehole log.  This may correspond to the borehole collar location (e.g., kelly bush).

indexData.operator.title: operator
indexData.operator.description: The <font color="#4f81bd">operator</font> property is an association between a <font color="#4f81bd">BoreholeDetails</font> and a <font color="#4f81bd">CIT:CI_ResponsibleParty</font> describing the organisation responsible for commissioning the borehole (as opposed to actually drilling the borehole).

indexData.driller.title: driller
indexData.driller.description: The <font color="#4f81bd">driller</font> property is an association between a <font color="#4f81bd">BoreholeDetails</font> and a <font color="#4f81bd">CIT:CI_ResponsibleParty</font> describing of the organisation responsible for drilling the borehole (as opposed to commissioning the borehole).

indexData.dateOfDrilling.title: dateOfDrilling
indexData.dateOfDrilling.description: The property <font color="#4f81bd">dateOfDrilling:TM_Period</font> describes the time period during which drilling of the borehole occurred.

indexData.startPoint.title: startPoint
indexData.startPoint.description: The property <font color="#4f81bd">startPoint:BoreholeStartPointCode</font> provides a term from a controlled vocabulary indicating the named position relative to ground surface where the borehole commenced. (e.g., natural ground surface, open pit floor, underground, offshore)

indexData.inclinationType.title: inclinationType
indexData.inclinationType.description: The property <font color="#4f81bd">inclinationType:BoreholeInclinationCode</font> contains a term from a controlled vocabulary indicating the inclination type of the borehole. Appropriate terms would include vertical; inclined up; inclined down, horizontal.

indexData.boreholeMaterialCustodian-1.title: boreholeMaterialCustodian
indexData.boreholeMaterialCustodian-1.description: The property <font color="#4f81bd">boreholeMaterialCustodian</font> is an association between <font color="#4f81bd">BoreholeDetails</font> and a <font color="#4f81bd">CIT:CI_ResponsibleParty</font> describing the organisation that is custodian of the drilled material recovered from the borehole.

indexData.boreholeMaterialCustodian-2.title: boreholeMaterialCustodian
indexData.boreholeMaterialCustodian-2.description: The property <font color="#4f81bd">boreholeMaterialCustodian</font> is an association between <font color="#4f81bd">BoreholeDetails</font> and a <font color="#4f81bd">CIT:CI_ResponsibleParty</font> describing the organisation that is custodian of the drilled material recovered from the borehole.

indexData.boreholeMaterialCustodian-3.title: boreholeMaterialCustodian
indexData.boreholeMaterialCustodian-3.description: The property <font color="#4f81bd">boreholeMaterialCustodian</font> is an association between <font color="#4f81bd">BoreholeDetails</font> and a <font color="#4f81bd">CIT:CI_ResponsibleParty</font> describing the organisation that is custodian of the drilled material recovered from the borehole.

indexData.purpose-1.title: purpose
indexData.purpose-1.description: The property <font color="#4f81bd">purpose:BoreholePurposeCode</font> contains a term from a controlled vocabulary describing the purpose for which the borehole was drilled. e.g., site investigation, mineral exploration, hydrocarbon exploration, water resources.

indexData.purpose-2.title: purpose
indexData.purpose-2.description: The property <font color="#4f81bd">purpose:BoreholePurposeCode</font> contains a term from a controlled vocabulary describing the purpose for which the borehole was drilled. e.g., site investigation, mineral exploration, hydrocarbon exploration, water resources.

indexData.purpose-3.title: purpose
indexData.purpose-3.description: The property <font color="#4f81bd">purpose:BoreholePurposeCode</font> contains a term from a controlled vocabulary describing the purpose for which the borehole was drilled. e.g., site investigation, mineral exploration, hydrocarbon exploration, water resources.

indexData.dataCustodian-1.title: dataCustodian
indexData.dataCustodian-1.description: The <font color="#4f81bd">dataCustodian</font> is an association between a <font color="#4f81bd">BoreholeDetails</font> and a <font color="#4f81bd">CIT:CI_ResponsibleParty</font> describing the custodian (person or organisation) that is the custodian of data pertaining to this borehole.

indexData.dataCustodian-2.title: dataCustodian
indexData.dataCustodian-2.description: The <font color="#4f81bd">dataCustodian</font> is an association between a <font color="#4f81bd">BoreholeDetails</font> and a <font color="#4f81bd">CIT:CI_ResponsibleParty</font> describing the custodian (person or organisation) that is the custodian of data pertaining to this borehole.

indexData.dataCustodian-3.title: dataCustodian
indexData.dataCustodian-3.description: The <font color="#4f81bd">dataCustodian</font> is an association between a <font color="#4f81bd">BoreholeDetails</font> and a <font color="#4f81bd">CIT:CI_ResponsibleParty</font> describing the custodian (person or organisation) that is the custodian of data pertaining to this borehole.

indexData.boreholeLength.title: boreholeLength
indexData.boreholeLength.description: The property <font color="#4f81bd">boreholeLength</font> (<font color="#4f81bd">SWE::Quantity</font>) contains a measurement (a value and a unit of measurement) corresponding to the "length" of a borehole determined by the data provider (i.e., "length" can have different sources, like drillers measurement, loggers measurement, survey measurement, etc.).

downholeDrillingDetails-1.drillingMethod.title: drillingMethod
downholeDrillingDetails-1.drillingMethod.description: The <font color="#4f81bd">drillingMethod:BoreholeDrillingMethodCode</font> property contains a term from a controlled vocabulary indicating the drilling method used. Appropriate terms would include rotary air blast, auger, diamond core, air core, etc.

downholeDrillingDetails-1.boreholeDiamet.title: boreholeDiameter
downholeDrillingDetails-1.boreholeDiamet.description: The <font color="#4f81bd">boreholeDiameter</font> property (<font color="#4f81bd">SWE::Quantity</font>) contains a measurement (a value and a unit of measure) corresponding to the diameter of the drilled hole.

downholeDrillingDetails-1.intervalBegin.title: intervalBegin
downholeDrillingDetails-1.intervalBegin.description: The <font color="#4f81bd">intervalBegin</font> property (<font color="#4f81bd">SWE::Quantity</font>) contains a measurement (a value and a unit of measurement) that corresponds to the measured distance of the start of the interval along the path of the borehole. The measured value must be less than or equal to the <font color="#4f81bd">intervalEnd</font> value.

downholeDrillingDetails-1.intervalEnd.title: intervalEnd
downholeDrillingDetails-1.intervalEnd.description: The property <font color="#4f81bd">intervalEnd</font> (<font color="#4f81bd">SWE::Quantity</font>) contains a measurement (a value and a unit of measurement) of the measured distance of the end of the interval along the path of the borehole. The measured value must be greater than or equal to the <font color="#4f81bd">intervalBegin</font> value.

logElement-1.title: logElement
logElement-1.description: The property logElement is an association between a Borehole and a BoreholeInterval instance to describe measured downhole intervals and their observed features.
